message: Hello Bob, I'm offering this product for $14,000. I believe it will be very valuable to you.
I appreciate the offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $12,000. I'm interested in the product, but I have to be mindful of my budget.
I understand your budget constraints, Bob. How about we meet in the middle at $13,000? This product truly delivers exceptional value.
I appreciate the offer, but I'm still a bit higher than $13,000. How about we try $11,500? I'm willing to make a compromise, but I need to stay within my budget.
